synopsis.text: When young Jim Hawkins' peaceful life assisting his mother at their family inn is disrupted by the arrival of the rowdy sailor Billy Bones, he is unwittingly thrust into a world of pirates and treasure. After Billy's death, Jim discovers a treasure map leading to the infamous Captain Flint's fortune, prompting him to embark on a thrilling journey to find the treasure alongside a group of local gentlemen and the enigmatic one-legged John Silver. As the adventure unfolds, Jim forms a close bond with Silver, only to discover that his new friend is actually a ruthless pirate and former right-hand man to Captain Flint. Feeling betrayed, Jim must navigate his complex emotions and confront Silver, who still maintains that they are friends. With a mutiny brewing and the treasure within reach, Jim's journey to Treasure Island becomes a test of loyalty, courage, and friendship.
